SELECT pinf.purinf_id, pinf.sales_nm, pinf.wanted_date, tr.return_cnt, SUM(tr.return_cnt*pinf.price) AS total, tr.rfinfo_id, td.return_id, td.confirmYN FROM ( SELECT tpi.purinf_id, tpi.wanted_date, ts.sales_id, ts.sales_nm ,ts.price FROM tb_purchaseinfo tpi JOIN tb_sales ts ON ts.sales_id=tpi.sales_id ) pinf JOIN tb_refundinfo tr ON pinf.purinf_id=tr.purinf_id LEFT JOIN tb_returndir td ON tr.rfinfo_id=td.rfinfo_id LEFT JOIN tb_delivdir td2 ON td.return_id =td2.return_id WHERE td2.deliv_id IS NULL
AND (pinf.wanted_date >= #{datesearch1} AND pinf.wanted_date <= (select date_add(date_format(#{datesearch2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)) )
AND pinf.sales_nm Like CONCAT('%', #{searchinput}, '%')
GROUP BY pinf.purinf_id LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT pinf.purinf_id FROM ( SELECT tpi.purinf_id FROM tb_purchaseinfo tpi JOIN tb_sales ts ON ts.sales_id=tpi.sales_id ) pinf JOIN tb_refundinfo tr ON pinf.purinf_id=tr.purinf_id LEFT JOIN tb_returndir td ON tr.rfinfo_id=td.rfinfo_id LEFT JOIN tb_delivdir td2 ON td.return_id =td2.return_id WHERE td2.deliv_id IS NULL
AND (pinf.wanted_date >= #{datesearch1} AND pinf.wanted_date <= (select date_add(date_format(#{datesearch2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)) )
AND pinf.sales_nm Like CONCAT('%', #{searchinput}, '%')
GROUP BY pinf.purinf_id ) alias

SELECT tpi.purinf_id , tri.rfinfo_id , tri.regdate, tri.return_cnt, tri.account_number , tri.account_holder , tri.bank_name , trd.return_id, delv.deliv_id , delv.detail_name AS deliverStatus , delv.orderid, delv.purinf_id, trd.confirmYN, (SELECT sales_nm from tb_sales ts WHERE ts.sales_id=tpi.sales_id) AS sales_nm FROM tb_purchaseinfo tpi JOIN tb_refundinfo tri ON tpi.purinf_id=tri.purinf_id LEFT JOIN tb_returndir trd ON trd.rfinfo_id =tri.rfinfo_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT td.purinf_id, td.orderid, td.return_id, td.deliv_id, td.deliverStatus, tdc.detail_name FROM tb_delivdir td JOIN tb_detail_code tdc ON td.deliverStatus=tdc.detail_code where tdc.group_code ="shipCD" ) delv ON delv.return_id=trd.return_id WHERE tri.rfinfo_id=#{rfinfoId}
